name: Longshaw Woodland Explorer Walk, Longshaw Estate

ai.summary: A 9.5 km moderate woodland loop at Longshaw Estate in the UK, weaving through shaded copses and open grounds with occasional gentle slopes and scenic views.
ai.terrain_summary: Mixed woodland trails with well-maintained paths, grassy sections, and some uneven ground or mud. Expect a few short rises and potential puddles after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths; wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Check the forecast and daylight hours, carry water and a small first aid kit, and bring a map or GPS. Keep dogs under control, watch for cyclists on shared routes, and let someone know your plan. Carry a fully charged phone and a whistle for emergencies; be prepared for muddy conditions after rain.
recommended_gear: Sturdy waterproof boots with good grip
Map and/or GPS device or offline maps
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; winter hiking is possible with extra care and proper gear, noting shorter daylight hours.

seo.title: Longshaw Woodland Explorer Walk (9.5 km) – Moderate Trail at Longshaw Estate, UK
seo.meta_description: Explore a 9.5 km moderate woodland hike at Longshaw Estate, UK. The Longshaw Woodland Explorer Walk offers shaded trails, mixed terrain, and wildlife in a scenic countryside setting.
seo.h1: Longshaw Woodland Explorer Walk – 9.5 km Moderate Trail
